PayWhirls intuitive tools make recurring: PayWhirls intuitive tools make recurring billing easy. Sell subscriptions, pre-orders, payment plans, or whatever billing arrangements you can dream up.
Authenticate with your Paywhirl API Key: Authenticate with your Paywhirl API Key
Cancel a customer's existing subscriptio: Cancel a customer's existing subscription. This will prevent the subscription from making any additional charges and unbind the customer from the plan.
Create a new customer. This is required: Create a new customer. This is required before binding a customer to a plan via a subscription.
Retrieve a selection of customers. Usefu: Retrieve a selection of customers. Useful for keeping track of customers in a local database.
Get a list of subscriptions associated w: Get a list of subscriptions associated with a given customer. Useful for determining which services a customer is currently expecting.
Enroll a customer in an existing plan. T: Enroll a customer in an existing plan. The customer must have a valid payment method on file.
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
Customer ID (can be used instead of subs: Customer ID (can be used instead of subscription_id)
Currency code (ex. USD, GBP, AUD, CAD, E: Currency code (ex. USD, GBP, AUD, CAD, EUR, etc)
Password (leave blank to let customer as: Password (leave blank to let customer assign via secure link in welcome email)
Country Code (ex. US, GB, CA, AU, etc): Country Code (ex. US, GB, CA, AU, etc)
PayWhirl ID of payment gateway to attach: PayWhirl ID of payment gateway to attach to customer. If left blank, first loaded gateway will be used.
Acquisition source (ex. google, bing, em: Acquisition source (ex. google, bing, email, fall_campaign, etc)
Acquisition medium (ex. CPC, banner, tex: Acquisition medium (ex. CPC, banner, text_ad, etc)
Number of entries to return. Limit 100.
Field to sort by. Default: id: Field to sort by. Default: id
All customers returned will have an ID l: All customers returned will have an ID less than this value
All customers returned will have an ID g: All customers returned will have an ID greater than this value
Filter by subscription status. Active (d: Filter by subscription status. Active (default) excludes canceled; Canceled shows only canceled; All shows all subscriptions.
UNIX timestamp in the future (UTC timezo: UNIX timestamp in the future (UTC timezone)
ID of promo code to apply: ID of promo code to apply
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
